General.Name: Austin Resources Ltd
General.Description: Austin Resources Ltd. operates as a mineral exploration and development company. It holds net smelter royalty of its interest in the mineral exploration properties in Chile. Austin Resources Ltd. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
